title: need a suggestion
content:
hey guys i need help from the seniors 

can anyone tell me which yt to refer for c language programming

i'm  2nd sem student

comments.body: [Apna College C ](https://youtu.be/irqbmMNs2Bo?si=DFZw0VXVYuq8b2Uf) covered pretty much everything that is there in the portions. Pretty good explanation too :)

I would recommend Jenny ma'ams playlist and also [mycode school](https://youtube.com/@mycodeschool?si=5oqvj_SpBSNmOzFN) my code school is old channel but with very explanation over there , it was by 2 Tech Chads of India

Code with harry was pretty good

helped me in both c and dsa
